--- select_singer_with_table_hint.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers@{FORCE_INDEX=SingersByFirstLastName}

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      62,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  10,
        Expr: nil,
        Star: true,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  62,
        Expr: &parser.TableName{
          end:   62,
          Ident: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  18,
            end:  25,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          Hint: &parser.Hint{
            pos: 25,
            end: 62,
            Map: map[string]parser.Expr{
              "FORCE_INDEX": &parser.Ident{
                pos:  39,
                end:  61,
                Name: "SingersByFirstLastName",
              },
            },
          },
          As: (*parser.Ident)(nil),
        },
        Method: "",
        Num:    nil,
        Rows:   false,
      },
    },
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers @{FORCE_INDEX = SingersByFirstLastName}
